item.title: How to access a server using SSH-keys
item.description: Pre-requisites On this post, we are going to configure and access a server using SSH on: Ubuntu 22.04 Linux machine Context During my first professional experience as a Data Scientist/ Engineer, I was responsible for a CNN (Convolutional Neural Network) model that predicts if the Electrocardiogram Exams (yes! It is that kind of heart-exam that children use to draw, with a continuous line!) presents a time-sensitive health condition, and if the patient needs to be prioritized for a doctor.
